PLOT SUMMARY

n this comedy, Lars Lindstrom is an awkwardly shy young man in a small northern town who finally brings home the girl of his dreams to his brother and sister-in-law&#039;s home. The only problem is that she&#039;s not real - she&#039;s a sex doll Lars ordered off the Internet. But sex is not what Lars has in mind, but rather a deep, meaningful relationship. His sister-in-law is worried for him, his brother thinks he&#039;s nuts, but eventually the entire town goes along with his delusion in support of this sweet natured boy that they&#039;ve always loved.
